```{r load}

```


```{r}
myvars <- c("mpg", "hp", "wt")
head(mtcars[myvars])
```

```{r}
summary(mtcars[myvars])
```

```{r}
mystats <- function(x, na.omit=FALSE) {
  if(na.omit)
    x <- x[!is.na(x)]
  m <- mean(x)
  n <- length(x)
  s <- sd(x)
  return(c(n=n, mean=m, stdev=s))
}

sapply( mtcars[myvars], mystats)
```

```{r}
#from Hmisc - seeing messages it's "masked"
Hmisc::describe(mtcars[myvars])
```
